弿字的基本解释

弿
jiǎn
难。
弓强劲有力。

弿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《集韻》九件切，上獮，見。］
(1)弓强。
(2)难，不顺。

弿字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弿； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页360第24
【集韻】紀偃切，音繭。弓强也。　又九件切，音蹇。【揚子·方言】弿，展也。齊晉曰弿，山之東西，凡難貌曰展。荆吳之人，相難謂之展。若齊魯之言相彈矣。【註】弿音蹇。

弿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弿字的起名意思

弓强劲有力。

弿

difficult.
The bow is strong and powerful.

[Nine pieces of "Ji Yun", see you on the top. ]
(1) The bow is strong.
(2) Difficult and not smooth.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Bow Character Department] 　弿; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 360 24
[Ji Yun] Ji Yan cut, sound cocoon. The bow is also strong.　 Another nine pieces cut, Yinjian. 【Yangtze Dialect】弿，展也. Qi Jin said 弿, the things of the mountain, everything that is difficult to look like is called exhibition. The people of Jingwu are hard to say. Ruo Qilu's words are colliding. [Note] Yiyin Jian.
